Projects.Title: Sales Insights Data analysis using Power Bi
Projects.Description: Developed and implemented Power BI dashboards for Atliq Hardware Company, providing real-time sales insights and empowered sales director with actionable insights for strategic decision-making.

Projects.Title: Skin Cancer Detection using AI
Projects.Description: A Deep learning model to detect skin cancer from images and accurately classify skin lesions with almost 97% accuracy. Experimented with CNN, VGG16, VGG19, and CNN-SVM hybrid model. A PhD project of My College Professor.

Projects.Title: Toxic Comment Classification
Projects.Description: A Machine learning model to classify and identify toxic comments percentage level on online platforms automatically detecting and categorizing comments into various toxicity levels. This project was part of the Jigsaw Toxic Comment Classification Challenge on Kaggle.
